about_the_game:
Show your fighting skills and teamwork! In the new Slovak Sci-Fi game, you will find yourself in the shoes of an operator or a monster. Your work in the skin of the operator will be various tasks on the map and run to the bloodthirsty monster. In the game you can with friends or so and that's how you can reach the goal.

What can you look forward to:
  • 8 operators who work together to complete tasks and 2 monsters (also players)
  • Large maps
  • Easy-Anticheat
  • Each operator and monster have unique abilities
  • The possibility of changing the plot of the map in real time (disconnecting part of the space station, etc...)
  • Tearing limbs
  • Special animations for hiding and equally special attacks for monsters
  • Different quests around the map, so it won't be the same and boring repetitive quest, will always be randomly generated
